creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
description: woman and barefoot girl, both wearing headscarves, standing at the opening to a shadowy alleyway; shadowy figure at center in alley; two women carrying baskets on yokes and another figure on street and end of alley

title: The Beggars
